https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nLj3HfUSMTYW4RfjBpnal6Up1Xk.jpg After her father dies in a horse riding accident, a displaced city girl named Cheryl is sent to live with a foster family on a farm in the country. Here she meets a magnificent horse. Cheryl learns to face her fear of horses and manages to race once again. American Black Beauty
